A team of professionals who take precision very seriously.

Omenium is developed in Mexico by a professional team who takes precision seriously. Many of us have a maritime background, as such, weather is not only a passion, it's a vital obsession. Our engineering team have years of experience in the field of development and weather monitoring, making the Omenium brand a reliable partner for your operations.
